title: New: Be To Get Her – Low
body:
Self-described ‘submarine-pop’, Kate Coultas aka **Be To Get Her** from Brighton has just released her newest track, titled Low.

With a handful of other recordings on her Soundcloud, _Low_ is clearly a marked progression in her work, far more confident, considered and all the more elegant for it. Check it out below.
